chester_sprinkles.currentChallenge: The Hunt for the Ghostly Treasure

ideas.idea: *Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Idea:* Pirate Battle. Would be cool to have a simple shooter where your pirate ship has to fight off other pirate ships.
*Submitted by:* David Mullen --- *Idea:* Poker game, e.g. Texas Hold'em or any kind of card game, against computer or human opponent.
*Submitted by:* David Mullen --- *Idea:* Direction puzzle game, e.g. ChuChu Rocket and RoboRally. Direct drunken pirates to different destinations.
*Submitted by:* Bret Owens --- *Idea:* Pirate Ship RPG: Inlcudes "Walk the Plank" turn based mini-game, Shanty creation, and Sprinkles as Captain
*Submitted by:* Taylor Montgomery --- *Idea:* Play the classic game Battleship using our own ships
*Submitted by:* Nathan Ryan --- *Idea:* Pirate Dress-up. Try different kicky outfits on your pirate!

*Submitted by:* Taylor Montgomery --- *Idea:* Plank Walkers - Price is Right Mountain Climbers game, but sub a plank for the mountain, and a random pirate from the channel for the climber. Guess the price of everyday pirate items (hook, dagger, eye patch, rum, peg leg, etc)

commands.command: *Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* dailyChallenge - Would provide a daily challange, something similar to code golf, daily UI challenges, etc.
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* techVocab - Provides a random technology term, framework, or tool and a short description of what it is.
*Submitted by:* Michael Morris --- *Command:* !inPirate $var = Use a regex expression on provided string to translate it into pirate speak, savvy?
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* !manOverboard - Rescues the last person to have walked the plank
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* Natural language parsing for commands :stuck_out_tongue:
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* !unicornOfTheSea - Displays a random Narwhal picture
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* !gimme Get some random sea junk
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* !hackerLeaderBoard - DM Command. Gives the count that you've executed the hackThePlanet and other commands
*Submitted by:* Michael Peacock --- *Command:* !ponyBro - add ponies to the channel b/c apparently they're already here
*Submitted by:* Robert Cole --- *Command:* !spam - Performs a command at random (walkThePlank, weapoj, drunkenSailor, etc)
*Submitted by:* Michael Morris --- *Command:* !addShanty - Add a shanty to the list
*Submitted by:* Michael Morris --- *Command:* !listShanites - See the shanty list
*Submitted by:* Jaforrest Jackson --- *Command:* !daily - post top pirates, top ships, and upcoming events
*Submitted by:* Michael Peacock --- *Command:* !zorldo - show gifs video game characters as imagined on Jeopardy
*Submitted by:* Michael Morris --- *Command:* !saavy - shows the number of days left til talk like a pirate day.
*Submitted by:* Jaforrest Jackson --- *Command:* !rescue - Try to save the last person to walk the plank. Should have a random chance for failure to rescue.
*Submitted by:* Michael Peacock --- *Command:* !intercom - send a message only visible to crew members of your ship
